verbs.description: WASHINGTON — [ARG1: Three Americans] [V: detained] [ARGM-LOC: in North Korea] [ARGM-TMP: for more than a year] are on their way back to the U.S. with Secretary of State Mike Pompeo , President Donald Trump announced Wednesday in the latest sign of improving relations between the two longtime adversary nations . https://twitter .

WASHINGTON — [ARG1: Three Americans detained in North Korea for more than a year] [V: are] [ARG2: on their way back to the U.S. with Secretary of State Mike Pompeo] , President Donald Trump announced Wednesday in the latest sign of improving relations between the two longtime adversary nations . https://twitter .

WASHINGTON — Three Americans detained in North Korea for more than a year are on their way back to the U.S. with Secretary of State Mike Pompeo , President Donald Trump announced Wednesday in the latest sign of [V: improving] [ARG1: relations between the two longtime adversary nations] . https://twitter .
